Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 539
Cwe : 0
IsExecutable : false
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 0
PackageId : 32
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList encode = Find_HTML_Encode() + Find_URL_Encode();

encode += Find_Methods().FindByShortName("*encode*", false);
encode -= Find_Methods().FindByShortName("*unencode*", false);

result = encode;
